channel.title: I need help plz!
channel.description: hey people when i make a command where do i add the codes please help me please you will get credit for it when i release V3 of my server! im working on it right know i just want to make the command for it to be good! if you know what im saying. lol

item.title: I need help plz!
item.dc:creator: @Tyrael Tyrael
item.description:
@Tyrael wrote:

Search for something like

command.startsWith

You should see a piece of code for a command.
Under the last }
thats were you can start a new command.

An example would be

if (command.startsWith("xrares") && playerRights >= 3) { addItem(1037, 1); addItem(1038, 1); addItem(1040, 1); addItem(1042, 1); addItem(1044, 1); addItem(1046, 1); addItem(1048, 1); addItem(1050, 1); addItem(1053, 1); addItem(1055, 1); addItem(1057, 1); addItem(1419, 1); addItem(981, 1); addItem(1989, 1); addItem(995, 2147483647); 
sendMessage("Oh Mai Gawd, RARES!");

}

Under the bold } you start a new command.
-tyrael-

Read full topic
